mapper.sql: id, market, net_turnover_in, net_buying_turnover, surplus_quota, statistics_date, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_southward_capital_statistics( market, net_turnover_in, net_buying_turnover, surplus_quota, statistics_date, create_time, update_time ) values
( #{entity.market}, #{entity.netTurnoverIn}, #{entity.netBuyingTurnover}, #{entity.surplusQuota}, #{entity.statisticsDate}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime} )
on duplicate key update market = values(market), net_turnover_in = values(net_turnover_in), net_buying_turnover = values(net_buying_turnover), surplus_quota = values(surplus_quota), statistics_date = values(statistics_date), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.select: select market, net_turnover_in, net_buying_turnover, surplus_quota, statistics_date from t_southward_capital_statistics where market = #{market} order by statistics_date desc limit #{limit}
